title: Getting started with Designer
text:
Select access level for collaborator: Edit or View.
Compose email or user name associated with Survey Solutions account.
Click INVITE to grant the specified access and have Survey Solutions send an invitation email.

title: Learning Survey Solutions
text:
Within questionnaire




Video



How

Right-click on question
Select Copy
Click just before desired paste point
Paste, either by


…


Clicking the PASTE button
Selecting Paste after from the right-click menu



Why

Create new object that shares many attributes of an existing object

title: Learning Survey Solutions
text:
Between questionnaires




Video



How

Right-click on question
Select Copy
Click just before desired insertion point
Right-click on object
Select Paste after

Why

Create new object in target questionnaire that shares many attributes of an existing object in the source questionnaire

title: Learning Survey Solutions
text:
… but exercise caution

Duplicates


Dependencies

title: Learning Survey Solutions
text:
Duplicates




Video



Problem

Variable names are unique IDs
Compilation error

Solution

Navigate to the pasted question
Change its variable name

title: Learning Survey Solutions
text:
Dependencies




Video



Problem

When object is copied, all of its attributes are copied
This includes references to objects that only exist in the source questionnaire, but not the target questionnaire

Solution

Identify references to objects in the source questionnaire
Delete them

Split server into (mostly) isolated divisions
Segregate own objects (e.g., questionnaires, interviews, assignments, etc.)
Restrict user access by workspace (i.e., whitelist users)
Allow only admin access to all workspaces

Types



For field operations

Interviewer


Supervisor


Observer


Headquarters




For technical tasks

Admin


API

title: Create users
text:
For field operations

Interviewer. Complete interviews,
Supervisor. Reassign work, review interviews.
Headquarters. Manages survey:

Creates users (i.e., Interviewer, Supervisor)
Imports interviews
Creates assignments
Reviews interviews
Exports data

Observer. Like Headquarters, but can only observe.

title: Create users
text:
For technical tasks

Admin. Like “super” Headquarters.

Can do everything Headquarters can.
Can do things Headquarters cannot:

Create workspaces.
Create all users (including Headquarters).


API. Like “super” Headquarters, but through API rather than GUI

title: Import the questionnaire
text:
What


Why


How






Fact 1: Headquarters distributes questionnaires


Fact 2: Questionnaires need to come from somewhere


Fact 3: Designer is that somewhere


Fact 4: Importing copies a questionnaire snapshot from Designer to Headquarters


Fact 5: Headquarters manages several different questionnaire snapshots as versions








Get started 

During initial server, must import questionnaire before assignments can be made.





Update 

When changes happen to the questionnaire, must import changes from Designer to Headquarters (e.g., add questions, correct conditions, etc.)





Test 

When developing, may want to import to test (e.g., see how works on Interviewer, distribute tests to tablets, etc.)









Video




Click on the Survey Setup menu
Select Questionnaires
Click on IMPORT QUESTIONNAIRE
Enter login and password for Designer
Click to select a questionnaire

title: Creating (simple) assignments
text:
Modify inputs



Objectives 🎯
TODO: list requirements for raw -> assignment
For ZiHBS example:

Load raw data
Transform character provience to categorical



TODO: adapt code to example created for slides


* =============================================================================
* Set paths
* =============================================================================

* !!! WARNING !!! Put your paths here before executing
local dir_in "C:/your/path"
local dir_out "`dir_in'"

* =============================================================================
* Data preparation
* =============================================================================

* -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Import the sample to be assigned
* -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

import delimited using "`dir_in'/example_sample.tsv", ///
    varnames(1) /// treat first line as variable names
    clear

* -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
* Transform columns into those expected by SuSo
* -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

* convert from numeric to string
rename province province_old
gen province = 
gen days_preferred = .

replace province = 1 if province_old == "Bulawayo
replace province = 2 if province_old == "Harare
replace province = 3 if province_old == "Manicaland
replace province = 4 if province_old == "Mashonaland Central
replace province = 5 if province_old == "Mashonaland East
replace province = 6 if province_old == "Mashonaland West
replace province = 7 if province_old == "Masvingo
replace province = 8 if province_old == "Matabeleland North
replace province = 9 if province_old == "Matabeleland South
replace province = 10 if province_old == "Midlands

* rename variables to match expected name

title: Creating (simple) assignments
text:
Export tab-delimited output



Objectives 🎯

Export to tab-delimited format
Save where expected





* =============================================================================
* Export to a tab-delimited file
* =============================================================================

export delimited using 
    "`dir_out'/assignments_to_import.tab", /// where to write the file
    delimiter(tab)  /// tab-delimited format
    nolabel         /// how to handle labelled data: write numbers; not labels
    replace
